resources.string: 1. What is illegal to handle in suspicious circumstances under the Salmon Act of 1986?
2. Are all swans in England the property of the Queen? *
Only first dibs on all wild, unmarked mute swans in open water
* This is a multiple choice question.
3. It is illegal to be drunk in the pub.
4. It is illegal to jump the queue in the tube ticket hall.
5. All beached whales and sturgeons found on the British coastline must be offered to?
6. You can not import potatoes into England and Wales if you have reasonable cause to suspect that they are Polish.
7. Is it an offence to beat or shake any carpet, rug, or mat before 8am in London?
